sub_title: 🌊Sanitary/Wastewater Civil Engineer || Sustainability Champion ||  Wastewater Management & Nutrient Recovery Proponent 🌍 Boosting Resource and Circular Economy Efficiency Through Innovative Waste Management Solutions
summary:
💡"Engineering a sustainable tomorrow by transforming water challenges into resourceful opportunities, one drop at a time."

Hello👋
I am a passionate and dedicated Sanitary and Civil Engineer with a strong focus on wastewater management and resource recovery. With a unique blend of technical expertise, innovative engineering practices, and data-driven decision-making skills, I have successfully contributed to diverse water and sewerage projects in Kenya, including a World Bank-funded initiative to design a water distribution plan for Mombasa County residents, residents, resulting in a 30% increase in water efficiency and improved infrastructure for over 250,000 residents.

Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Urban Water and Sanitation with a specialization in Sanitary Engineering from IHE Delft Institute, Netherlands. My research focuses on designing a novel wastewater treatment process for nutrient recovery. My diverse skill set includes Lab-based Physio-Chemical and Microbial Analysis Skills, AutoCAD and Civil 3D, KYPIPE 2018 Hydraulic Modeling Software, Biowin Wastewater Modeling software, and the Microsoft Office Suite. 

🏆 Key achievements as a Water Engineer:
✔️Increased water efficiency by 30% and improved infrastructure for over 250,000 Mombasa County residents, including those in informal settlements. 
✔️Analyzed and utilized data to optimize civil engineering projects, resulting in a 10% improvement in resource allocation and project effectiveness.
✔️Designed pipelines and storage reservoirs for drinking water distribution networks, optimizing resource allocation and network performance.
✔️ Implemented sustainability-conscious practices, promoting the reuse of resources to reduce negative environmental impact.

🔹Notable Projects Experience:
✔️ Kisumu, Kenya Informal Settlement Sanitation Program
✔️Integrated Water & Irrigation Master Plan for Murang'a County, Kenya
✔️Water Distribution Works for Mombasa County, Kenya & 3 WSPs (World Bank Funded)
✔️Narok Town Sewerage Project (Africa Development Bank Funded)

🔹Professional Affiliations:
🎖️ Graduate Engineer, Engineers Board of Kenya (EBK)
🎖️ Graduate Engineer, The Institute of Engineers of Kenya (IEK)

I am eager to leverage my expertise in designing integrated, long-term solutions to water and sanitary challenges while prioritizing resource recovery for a sustainable and healthier future. 

Let's connect and work together for a better, more sustainable world! Or discuss the latest Wastewater Management and Resource Recovery Advancements! 🤝🌍
